info.title: AWS Panorama
info.description:
AWS Panorama

Overview

This is the AWS Panorama API Reference. For an introduction to the service, see What is AWS Panorama? in the AWS Panorama Developer Guide.

servers.description: The Panorama endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)
The Panorama endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)

post.description: Creates a package and storage location in an Amazon S3 access point.

allOf.description: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of packages to return in one page of results.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

get.description: Returns information about an application instance on a device.

allOf.description: The ID of the application instance that this instance replaced.
When the application instance was created.
When the device reported the application's state.
The application instance's runtime role ARN.

get.description: Returns information about an application instance's configuration manifest.

allOf.description: The ID of the application instance that this instance replaced.
When the application instance was created.
The application instance's default runtime context device.
Parameter overrides for an application instance. This is a JSON document that has a single key (PayloadData) where the value is an escaped string representation of the overrides document.
Parameter overrides for the configuration manifest.

A application verion's manifest file. This is a JSON document that has a single key (PayloadData) where the value is an escaped string representation of the application manifest (graph.json). This file is located in the graphs folder in your application source.

get.description: Returns a list of application node instances.

allOf.description: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

parameters.name: ApplicationInstanceId
parameters.description: The node instances' application instance ID.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of node instances to return in one page of results.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

put.description: Signal camera nodes to stop or resume.

allOf.description: The camera node's name, from the application manifest.

items.description: A signal to a camera node to start or stop processing video.

get.description: Returns a list of application instance dependencies.

allOf.description: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of application instance dependencies to return in one page of results.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

allOf.description: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.
The account ID of the node's owner.

items.description: An application node that represents a camera stream, a model, code, or output.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of nodes to return in one page of results.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: ownerAccount
parameters.description: Search for nodes by the account ID of the nodes' owner.

parameters.name: patchVersion
parameters.description: Search for nodes by patch version.

items.description: Details about a beta appliance software update.

allOf.description: Beta software releases available for the device.
The IP address of the server.
The domain name of the server.
Details about an NTP server connection.

The target version of the device software.

Returns information about the latest device job.
A device's latest job. Includes the target image version, and the job status.
The latest software version available for the device.
How the device gets an IP address.
Network configuration for a static IP connection.

NTP servers to use, in order of preference.

The network configuration for a device.

post.description: Creates a job to run on a device. A job can update a device's software or reboot it.

allOf.description: Whether to apply the update if it is a major version change.
The target version of the device software.
A configuration for an over-the-air (OTA) upgrade. Required for OTA jobs.

JobType.description: The type of job to run.

allOf.description: The ID of the target device.
The name of the target device

items.description: A job that runs on a device.

allOf.description: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

parameters.name: DeviceId
parameters.description: Filter results by the job's target device ID.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of device jobs to return in one page of results.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

get.description: Returns information about a device job.

allOf.description: For an OTA job, the target version of the device software.
The account ID of the node's owner.

parameters.name: OwnerAccount
parameters.description: The account ID of the node's owner.

ClientToken.description: A client token for the package import job.

InputConfig.description: A configuration for a package import job.

JobTags.description: Tags for the package import job.

JobType.description: A job type for the package import job.

OutputConfig.description: An output configuration for a package import job.

allOf.description: Indicates that the version is recommended for all users.

get.description: Returns a list of package import jobs.

allOf.description: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

items.description: A job to import a package version.

allOf.description: A list of package import jobs.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of package import jobs to return in one page of results.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

get.description: Returns information about a package import job.

allOf.description: A configuration for a package import job.
The location of an output object in Amazon S3.

An output configuration for a package import job.

ARNs of accounts that have write access to the package.

get.description: Returns information about a package version.

allOf.description: Whether the version is the latest available.
The account ID of the version's owner.

OutputPackageName.description: An output package name for the node.

OutputPackageVersion.description: An output package version for the node.

get.description: Returns a list of camera stream node jobs.

allOf.description: A pagination token that's included if more results are available.

items.description: A job to create a camera stream node.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of node from template jobs to return in one page of results.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.

get.description: Returns information about a job to create a camera stream node.

delete.description:
Deletes a package.

To delete a package, you need permission to call s3:DeleteObject in addition to permissions for the AWS Panorama API.

parameters.name: ForceDelete
parameters.description: Delete the package even if it has artifacts stored in its access point. Deletes the package's artifacts from Amazon S3.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: If the version was marked latest, the new version to maker as latest.

MarkLatest.description: Whether to mark the new version as the latest version.
